description:
So, you want to make a website, but you have no idea how to do it. It's okay to relax now. In this class, we're going to learn the basics of HTML, or HyperText Markup Language.

HTML is the building block for creating web pages. Regardless of what information a web page contains, every page is curated using some form of HTML.

This class explains the basics of how HTML works behind the scenes inside web pages and walk you through the steps involved in creating a web page. By the end, you'll be creating some simple web pages and will be ready to move on to other languages like CSS, JavaScript and more.
title: Introduction to HTML: Build simple HTML webpages
